Posts.Content: Last week, after I found out that I was going to have to have a mastectomy, me and one of the doctors I work for (gynecologist) were talking about bra sizes. I told her that although I dislike being a "D" cup, I hate having to have a mastectomy. I told her I thought that a 36C was a good size. She replied that she used to be a 32A, but now she is a 32 long. I thought I'd lose it! At least it made me smile.
Posts.Title: An Indian with one testicle
